Support

Compliance Officer & iCompany Secretary

Address :

Lower Parel, Mumbai

For any assistance on share-related matters including dematerialisation, rematerialisation, transfer, transmission of shares, sub-division or consolidation, issue of duplicate share certificates, dividends:

Mumbai
